text: Tomáš Fajčík (born 21 May 1995) is a Slovak footballer who currently plays for Rimavská Sobota on 3. Liga.Profile at Futbalnet, futbalnet.sk ==Club career== ===Dukla Banská Bystrica=== Fajčík made his Fortuna Liga debut for Dukla Banská Bystrica on 16 May 2015 against Slovan Bratislava at Pasienky.SLOVAN BRATISLAVA VS. title: Tomáš Fajčík
